FuncDef: The delete virtual-partition command deletes a virtual partition from an open application system. The delete virtual-partition command deletes a virtual partition from an open application system.

ParaDef.Info:
Virtual partition of the root path.
-

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: Warning: The virtual partition will be deleted. Continue? [Y/N]:y
Warning:The virtual partition will be deleted. Continue? [Y/N]:y
